00029 class disk_queue;
00030 
00033 class stats
00034 {
00035     friend class disk_queue;
00036     unsigned reads, writes;             // number of operations
00037     int64 volume_read, volume_written;            // number of bytes read/written
00038     double t_reads, t_writes;                   //  seconds spent in operations
00039     double p_reads, p_writes;                   // seconds spent in parallel operations
00040     double p_begin_read, p_begin_write;                 // start time of parallel operation
00041     double p_ios;               // seconds spent in all parallel I/O operations (read and write)
00042     double p_begin_io;
00043     int acc_ios;
00044     int acc_reads, acc_writes;                  // number of requests, participating in parallel operation
00045     double last_reset;
00046 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00047     boost::mutex read_mutex, write_mutex, io_mutex;
00048 #else
00049     mutex read_mutex, write_mutex, io_mutex;
00050 #endif
00051 
00052     static stats * instance;
00053 
00054     stats ();
00055 public:
00058     static stats * get_instance ();
00061     unsigned get_reads () const;
00064     unsigned get_writes () const;
00067     int64 get_read_volume () const;
00070     int64 get_written_volume () const;
00075     double get_read_time () const;
00080     double get_write_time () const;
00085     double get_pread_time() const;
00090     double get_pwrite_time() const;
00095     double get_pio_time() const;
00098     double get_last_reset_time() const;
00100     void reset();
00101 
00102 
00103 #ifdef COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00105     void _reset_io_wait_time();
00106     // void reset_io_wait_time() { stxxl::wait_time_counter = 0.0; }
00112     double get_io_wait_time() const;
00116     double increment_io_wait_time(double val);
00117 #else
00119     void _reset_io_wait_time();
00126     double get_io_wait_time() const;
00130     double increment_io_wait_time(double val);
00131 #endif
00132 
00133     // for library use
00134     void write_started (unsigned size_);
00135     void write_finished ();
00136     void read_started (unsigned size_);
00137     void read_finished ();
00138 };
